messages.message: Can we make an easy way to view ouptuts after process file steps? For instance I ran on 190 documents but the problem is I click on one, it takes me to a page where then I have to click the file name again then see the result load. To view 5-10 takes long because of how many click. Is there a way or tool we can build to make it very easy to review .ibdoc files?
I'd love to see Text Editor or something like it be able to open up a folder full of IBDoc files and scroll through them.... it'd make scoping out use cases so much easier
I am happy to work with someone to build the requirements and desired product features/ui's
Any reason you don't use refiner for that (assuming there aren't too many super long docs, which will break the ui)
But yeah the review batch / review ocr screens are painful when looking at more than a few docs and involve way too much clicking
